from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    # Create a rule-based system to generate sentences
    rules = {
        "cityServed": lambda sub, obj: f"{sub} serves the city of {obj}.",
        "country": lambda sub, obj: f"{sub} is located in {obj}.",
        "capital": lambda sub, obj: f"The capital of {sub} is {obj}.",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel": lambda sub, obj: f"{sub} has an elevation of {obj} meters above sea level.",
        "location": lambda sub, obj: f"{sub} is located in {obj}.",
        # ... Add more rules here ...
    }

    # Generate the sentence using the rule-based system
    sentence = ""
    for triple in triples:
        if triple.predicate in rules:
            sentence += rules[triple.predicate](triple.subject, triple.object) + " "

    # Return the generated sentence
    return sentence

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
